description: Pocket Fire brings the power of fire into your pocket! It simulates a relaxing, visually pleasing fire with amazingly realistic motion. It is ideal to watch if you want to take a mental break and need some distraction. Apart from the normal fire, you can also choose an icy variant and a mysterious hollow fire. To change the type, tap the screen. To create a fireball, move a finger across the screen! With update 1.1, you can also try the new Sun and Bomb modes. With version 1.2, there is a new mode called Pattern. The controls are now adjusted to WebOS - the back gesture can be used to show the menu.
